projects.name: DROPSY: A different take on the old school adventure genre.
projects.blurb: Dropsy is an adventure game with a focus on exploration, emotion, and surrealism. Made complete with a hint of early 90's nostalgia.

projects.name: Against the Wall
projects.blurb: Journey through a dangerous and strange world where everything exists on the side of an infinite brick wall.

projects.name: Zombicider
projects.blurb: Zombicider is a game based on the concept that to get around, you must cut through a crowd of zombies, but you can never kill them all.

projects.name: Crowman & Wolfboy - iOS Adventure
projects.blurb: Join this unlikely pair of Shadow Creatures, on an epic metaphysical journey to escape their own nature and find a greater meaning.

projects.name: Cognition: An Erica Reed Thriller
projects.blurb: A supernatural adventure game featuring FBI Agent Erica Reed on the hunt for a serial killer who knows her secret: post-cognition.

projects.name: Blink: A surreal first-person gaming experience
projects.blurb: Blink is a first-person game crafted with an innovative formula of platforming, puzzles, and mystery.

projects.name: Multiplayer Space Combat - Ensign 1
projects.blurb: Ensign 1 is an immersive space combat game which will allow players to board and pilot capitol ships.

projects.name: Matriarchy: A Social Game
projects.blurb: You are the queen of a remote mountain kingdom, isolated but being drawn into the outside world. Will your people thrive or perish?

projects.name: Narratavius Story Engine
projects.blurb: The Narratavius Story Engine is an iPhone app that will be able to play a number of different text adventures in multiple genres.

projects.name: Jak and Poi: a new twist on Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.blurb: As a kid, did you ever play a dinosaur, super hero or robot to try and win at Rock, Paper, Scissors? Jak and Poi is that game and more.

projects.name: Forge Quest - A Sandbox Action RPG
projects.blurb: A classic zelda like adventuring game inside of a sandbox world.  Explore, fight, craft and build inside the always changing landscape.

projects.name: Ortus: The RPG of your dreams!
projects.blurb: Ortus is a massive story-focused RPG, based in a world where every choice you make results in your own unique path in the game!

projects.name: God of Blades- a retrofantasy adventure for iOS devices
projects.blurb: A 2.5D sidescrolling action RPG for iOS devices that vividly depicts an epic retro-fantasy, sword and sorcery saga.

projects.name: Stop Those Fish for iPhone & iPad
projects.blurb: In this casual mobile game with beautiful graphics and innovative gameplay, you are a bear tasked with drowning the fish uprising.

projects.name: Aera - Mobile Application
projects.blurb: Aera is a mobile game that brings imagination to life. Explore, Create, Collect, Fight and Experience a mobile game unlike any other.

projects.name: Pissed Off Penguins
projects.blurb: This is an Open Source 2D Game Project using the Blender 3D Game Engine.  Angry Birds Style.

projects.name: Sun Stones: An original puzzle game for iOS and Android.
projects.blurb: Help kickstart an indie game studio and get Sun Stones off the ground!

projects.name: StarDrive -- a 4x Action Strategy Game for the PC
projects.blurb: StarDrive is a space-themed 4X Action Strategy game with deep ship design, colonization, diplomacy, research, and beautiful 3D graphics

projects.name: Pota-Toss - Amazing Indie iOS game with GPS-based levels!
projects.blurb: A new artillery game with location based levels! Now with the chance to be free with our $25K stretch goal!

projects.name: Puzzle Clubhouse: Crowd Designed Episodic Game Dev
projects.blurb: Ready to be a Game Designer? At Puzzle Clubhouse, people who PLAY games help MAKE games! Design, Submit, Vote and Play!
